item.title: Daily Security News from @trustpath - Dec 6, 2016
item.description:
Daily Security news from @trustpath.

Protecting the future at Anticipate 2016

… shifted to target user identities and applications, and that the growing incidence of data breaches is proof that a new approach to security is needed.

Edge360 Deploys PSIM Solution for Department of State

This real-time physical security information management solution will provide the State Department with actionable information for immediate reaction …

WinMagic Survey Highlights Employee Risk to Corporate Data on Personal

RealWire (press release) Working on data remotely helps employees be flexible and productive, however, one of the most common ways for data breaches to occur is through …

Charities fined over ‘wealth screening’ data breaches

Two charities have been fined over data protection breaches after secretly screening donors so they could be targeted for more money.

BeyondTrust and Westcon-Comstor Expand Global Distribution Agreement

The move underscores escalating demand for security solutions that guard against insider threats and data breaches for businesses of all sizes.

FriendFinder Data Breach Exposes 400 million+ Accounts

A dynamic infographic titled World’s Biggest Data Breaches of selected losses greater than 30,000 records provides a useful way to understand the …

Information Security Forum Forecasts 2017 Global Security Threat Outlook

In 2017, the number of data breaches will grow along with the volume of compromised records, becoming far more expensive for organizations of all …

Phishing-as-a-service is making it easier than ever for hackers to steal

ZDNet … solution for the beginner scammer” including databases of emails, templates of phishing scams and a backend database to store stolen credentials.

SecurityScorecard report: Top retailers have major security issues this

SDTimes.com All of that consumer data needs to be protected, and oftentimes, according to the report, it is the largest retailers that succumb to data breaches..

Why Legal Marketing Technologists Need To Learn About Blockchain

As a legal marketing technologist, I feel that one of my responsibilities to my firm and lawyers is to keep an eye on and become knowledgeable about …

DailyMotion Data Breach Affects 87.6 Million Users

The year 2016 has been filled with data breaches, affecting both small and large companies. Traditional platforms are often targeted by hackers due to …

Bluefin Payment Systems and iModules Software Announce Partnership for

Benzinga “According to the Identity Theft Resource Center, there have been 932 reported data breaches in the U.S. this year, an increase of 26.9% over last …

Palo Alto Networks Traps Named a 2016 CRN Product of the Year Winner

“This award, which was determined by feedback from our partners, further validates the strength of our Traps advanced endpoint protection product …

IMPROVING SECURITY FOR CRIMINAL JUSTICE AND MUNICIPALITIES

… platform SEQ|OPS is an on-demand managed security service that is redefining best practices for security information management.

80 million Dailymotion accounts ‘compromised in cyber attack’

The details of more than 80 million users of the video site Dailymotion have been compromised in a cyber attack, a breach detection site claims.
